However, the dice are not for rolling, they are used as the warriors of the Viking tribes and put on various regions of the board. The pip value of the dice represents the warriors’ power, determining the winners in the battles.

The game is played through three years. Each year, one of the gods makes an order that needs to be obeyed by all the players for the whole year.

Players, as the commander of a Viking tribe, place their own warriors on the board, reinforce them, fight other tribes, and try to take control of different regions by having the most Viking warriors in them to gain points and bring glory to their tribes.
At the end of the third year, the player with the highest glory will win the game.

Name: Serviam
Description:
Even if this is blasphemy, I have no regrets, all for prosperity

The tyrant has fallen ill and a power struggle is taking place. The people who have been suffering from oppression are looking forward to the arrival of the virtuoso, but as venerable merchants, we must see reality rather than dreams.
What we should think about now is how to get into the influential people of the new era.

Players embrace the powers to become the owner of a venerable merchant and solidify their position. It is also good to give a gift that the person in power likes. It is also good to use dark means. If you increase the influence of those in power with support, you will get a big reward, but sometimes you may benefit another family.
In addition to the normal mode for 2 to 4 people who can enjoy deep bargaining, a mode for 1 person is also installed.


     A card game for 1 to 4 players who aims to be the best merchant with the joy of those in power.
     Is it a sweet candy to prepare to outsmart the business enemies? Or is it a black envelope?


-Equipped with a solo play mode to prevent the Bazzi-Betti family's plot

The game consists of 7 rounds , during which you will play a single card from your hand to one of your available contacts alter the influence board sometimes activating unique effects and then score for the position of that contact. 
at the end of the game (and after end game scoring) the player with the most victory points will be the winner.

Serviam is a hand management game in which players need to make decisions based on who they have contact with , who other players have contact with , positions of those contacts and if they should gift or threat them.

—description from the designer

Name: Tarax World Champion Cricket Game
Description:
Tarax World Champion Cricket is a game produced by the Australian soft drink company called Tarax.

The game is played with 2 players with a fielding team and a batting that play for 8 overs (8 balls per over) in total.

The bowling and batting teams are each dealt 8 cards per over. The cards are coloured  which have to be matched to coloured sections of the playing field. The batting team must match the colours from the bowling team and can score runs over the 4 overs. After 4 overs the teams swap. The winner is the team that has scored to most runs after their 4 overs.

—user summary

Name: Fantastic Women
Description:
Play the game. Change the game.
Make sure your kids know who paved the way for women while playing this fun and engaging trump card game!

Discover some of the bravest and most inspirational women out there with these stunning portraits by Daniela Henríquez.

Compare notes on 32 of the most courageous women ever, from Malala Yousafzai and Rosa Parks to Marie Curie and Amelia Earhart. Get ready to inspire the next generation of changemakers and groundbreakers while playing this fun and informative game!

Name: Dick Tracy Detective Game
Description:
Dick Tracy Detective Game is a simple spin-and-move race game, published by Einson-Freeman as part of their "Funland" brand.

As players advance around a board picturing the east coast of the United States, a comic book-style story unfolds, telling how Dick Tracy foils a swindle by his enemy, the Stooge. Landing on black spaces, with special instructions, either advances or sends each players back. The first player to reach the finish line and arrest the Stooge is the winner.

The E-F editions included a spinner and four player counters, depicting Dick Tracy (red), Chief Brandon (yellow), the Stooge (blue), and Junior (green).

—user summary

Name: Halloween Adventure
Description: An exciting new Halloween-themed adventure. 18 new, Halloween-themed creatures and encounter cards for the Adventure Builder game.

Name: KLOAK: The Undercover Strategy Game
Description:
On your turn, move any piece on the board one space in any direction. For the small pieces, the adjacent space must be open to move. For the big pieces, you can move onto any open adjacent space or onto any adjacent space with a small piece. As small pieces are moved and covered (kloaked), you have to remember where they are. Be first to align two sets of three small pieces of the same color and win!

—description from the designer

Name: Say my Name 2: Expansión
Description: Expand your Say my Name with 50 new cards.

Name: Say my Name 3: Expansión
Description: Expand your Say my Name with 50 new cards.

Name: Campus Wahala
Description: Campus Wahala is a Mancala based card game set in a Nigerian university. Cards either show books (with different values) or characters (each with a unique skill). On their turn, players draw 5 cards from a stack and, starting with their own "locker" (tableau), place one card in each of the next four lockers (clockwise). However, the character cards interfere with this order, they can be used to jump lockers, nullify or steal other players' books, etc. When a locker contains 5 cards, it is emptied. Books go to a personal score pile, character cards are discarded. When the pile is used up, whoever has the most valuable books is the winner.

Name: Carnegie: Departments and Donations Expansion
Description:
This expansion includes four modules:

A- A new beginning (A notepad to customize your starting resources)

B- 16 new departments (2 of each for a total of 32 departments)

C- New Donations (4 new donation tiles)

D- Optional rules

Name: Eclipse: Second Dawn for the Galaxy – Remnants of Worlds Afar
Description: Eclipse: Second Dawn for the Galaxy – Remnants of Worlds Afar contains the last playable components that were not previously available outside of the Worlds Afar Collection from the Kickstarter campaign in 2020. It consists of a punch sheet with 6 additional Discovery Tiles, as well as alternative designs for the Ancients, Guardians, and the GCDS.
